title: This patch has borugt me new fun as well as utterly destroying my fun and making me feel useless
body:
season 5)where i started in patch 5.14 i was pretty trash forever bronze no game mechanics shaco always invade main. even since lvl 20 ive always mained talon following numerous long breaks season 6 i got back inot the game and was able to achieve silver by a sudden boost of talon "skill" where id win lane roa instnatly kill adc and or click in the middle of an enemy team and oenshot all of them getting a free quad and penta then just winning.  now however i feel like they added TOO much counterplay. lets say for instance they have a jg skarner, a vayne, and a tresh. if im playing my second choice akali theres no way im geting close the vayne. if i do ill get multistunned before i do anything. with talon, his e has a clunky sort of cast time where theres half a second before he can do anything, and the rest of his kit is quite slowed down too. the only thing thats really better is his lane,where u can burst someone lvl 2 with ign and passive. if they want to keep his kits burst delay window small i understand but i feel like he should be able to cast abilities in the iddle of his jump. with my otp often prermabanned im stuck mid with akali, sure i can win lane if if i survive the pre 6 poke barrage. even then i find it difficult to get the adc without getting cced then oneshot. in my previous bronze games there was no concept of a back and front line but now that im facing bronze to golds its hit me randomly. its besides the point that ive eyt to play a game in ranked since last week where bot didnt feed before lvl 6 atleast 2 kills, wich does make life hard. i am however looking to relearn most of the game and improve

also am i the only one that thinks rengar is damn broken he legit only has to q u once or twice for u to die if ur bot feeds him even if not hes insanely strung, i for one think he had ore counteprlay before the patch
